page.title: 07LIFE STYLES CHANGING TIMES
page.content: INTERVIEW MRS. MARY GRAY. EARLIER IN THE CENTURY THE {COST}OF {MEDICAL CARE INFLUENCED ITS APPLICATION,SELF MEDICATION WAS COMMON,SOMETIMES WITH TRAGIC CONSEQUENCES. HOPSCOTCH,HOOPS,TOPS,MARBLES,CONKERS, IMAGINATIVE PLAY AND SIMPLE CRICKET AND FOOTBALL WERE FOR YOUNG CHILDREN. TEENAGERS HAD,IN ADDITION, CARDS,BOARD GAMES,DARTS AND SPENT MUCH TIME READING. PAY PURCHASED LESS, SO STAPLE DIET WAS SIMPLE STEWS AND SOUPS.MOST HAD VEGETABLE GARDENS AND MANY KEPT A PIG. TRAIN FAIRS WERE EXPENSIVE, SO MANY CYCLED GREATER DISTANCES :TRADERS CARTS WERE USED FOR ORGANIZED OUTINGS. ATTITUDES TOWARDS PEERS MUCH AS TODAY, BUT OBEDIENCE TO PARENTS AND AUTHORITY FIGURES,BACKED BY CORPORAL PUNISHMENT, WAS MORE EVIDENT. {
